title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects. I am experiencing an issue where I am unable to see the class hierarchies of internal jars when I select a binary project. Additionally, I do not understand the error message that is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a class within the project.
3. Press the F4 key.
